name: Bacteria (itch)
description:
'Bacteria' is a new puzzle game from the creators of 'Energy Balance' and 'Energy Cycle'.

This game is based on the rules of the cellular automaton 'Life' created by John Horton Conway in 1970.
(Want to know more? Read how it works here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conway's_Game_of_Life)

In 'Bacteria' there is a square-shaped game field in a stable state. You need to add a certain number of cells into it so that after a few steps the field will be cleared. You can draw a single point, or use standard 'Life' patterns like "Glider" (the cells move at a certain angle) and "Lightweight spaceship (LWSS)" (the cells move in a straight line).

Depending on the difficulty level, the player can use a smaller area to add new cells.

'Bacteria' on STEAM Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=576560695
